verbs.description: [ARG0: rockets] [V: mike] [ARG1: d'antoni] discusses expectations pressure surrounding lakers with the lakers potential greatly increased with the addition of lebron james rockets coach mike d'antoni can likely relate to luke walton as walton deals with the expectations for the first time d'antoni however said he can not offer much advice on the subject houston los angeles lakers phoenix phoenix arizona rockets band national basketball association new york lakers lebron james luke walton rockets los angeles mike d'antoni nba mike dantoni
